we have recently added this amazingly moist american classic to our repertoire, and boy is it a hit! bright red sponge cake flavored with a little cocoa, & layered with luscious cream cheese icing.
the classic! smooth, creamy, new york style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust. available plain or with fruit topping..
an old-time favorite! spice cake with shredded carrots, walnuts & raisins, layered with cream cheese icing.
delicious! vanilla sponge layered with coconut cream & coconut icing, sprinkled with coconut flakes.
designed for the lemon lover. vanilla sponge layered with lemon buttercream & topped with lemon cream icing.
short & sweet! vanilla sponge layered with fresh strawberries & fresh whipped cream.
an elegant choice! chocolate sponge and espresso-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone, whipped cream, custard & ganache.
the baker's favorite! vanilla sponge layered with mocha cream & a fresh whipped cream exterior! sprinkled with toasted almonds.
for coffee lovers! vanilla sponge soaked in espresso, layered with mocha cream inside & out. topped with toasted almonds.
a timeless favorite. vanilla sponge layered & iced with chocolate cream & rich chocolate buttercream.
it's not just for cookies! vanilla sponge layered with chocolate mousse & sprinkled with chocolate chips!
delightful! silky-smooth, chocolate mousse, supported by a single layer of chocolate sponge, smothered in ganache.
a magnificent design! chocolate & raspberry mousses delicately layered over a base of classic chocolate sponge.
intensely chocolate! chocolate sponge layered with chocolate cream, smothered in chocolate fudge icing.
a chocolate paradise! chocolate sponge layered with chocolate mousse, wrapped in a rich chocolate buttercream exterior
the richest cake on our menu! chocolate sponge layered with chocolate fudge, chocolate buttercream & raspberry - draped in chocolate ganache.
a gorgeous creation! chocolate sponge layered with fresh whipped cream, chocolate cream, & a hint of raspberry. heaped with dramatic chocolate shavings.
for the romantic! hazelnut sponge layered with mocha buttercream, raspberry & chocolate ganache.
a traditional patisserie standard! almond sponge layered with vanilla buttercream, dusted in powdered sugars
a classic favorite! flaky puff pastry with a sweet custard filling, topped with vanilla glaze.
melts in your mouth - 100% flourless. choose mocha buttercream or chocolate buttercream filling.
a must-have for holidays, or any time! our all-butter pie shell is bursting with the finest fillings - choose: apple, pumpkin, blueberry, peach, or coconut custard.
light & lovely! a sweet lemon curd topped with airy meringue, in our all-butter tart shell.
just like mom used to make! layers & layers of puff pastry, filled with granny smith apples, & drizzled with a sweet honey glaze.
as beautiful as it is scrumptious! our all-butter pie shell is filled with fresh, homemade cream, and heaped with seasonal fresh fruit.
a home-style classic! our all-butter tart shell is filled & baked with the best ingredients - choose: pecan, apple, black cherry, pear, apricot or peach
when you need your treats in single servings! same selection as the fresh fruit or baked tarts. we'll give you a variety, or you can choose your own.
lassen's very own, made on the premises! all the classic italian styles and more - made with real butter & the finest ingredients.
perfect for kids of all ages! please place your custom order at least one day in advance.
please order 5 days in advance. strawberry shortcake, lemon buttercream, carrot cake, coconut layer, chocolate mousse, mocha whip, opera, napoleon, miserables

menu_item.itemname: please order 5 days in advance. sachetorte, mocha buttercream, chocolate chip, chocolate layer, chocolate decadence, raspberry chocolate fudge, black or white forest
